name: Gems Incremental
description: This is a very small incremental game so far but will have much more later on, hope you enjoy what is there! All art is made by me.  PLAY IN FULL SCREEN!! Also, BE PREPARED FOR DATA LOSSES, CLOUD SAVING IS NOT YET HERE. DATA LOSSES MAY OCCUR PER UPDATE UNTIL FIXED. Thank you! Please join my discord server: https://discord.gg/YHHCGRWQx4
